original_text: As soon as his master heard the words that his wife spoke to him, “This is the way your servant treated me,” his anger was kindled.
korean_text: 그의 주인이 자기 아내가 자기에게 이르기를 당신의 종이 내게 이같이 행하였다 하는 말을 듣고 심히 노한지라

sentences.original_text: As soon as his master heard the words
that his wife spoke to him
This is the way your servant treated me
sentences.korean_translation: 네 종이 나를 대한 방식이 이것이다
